CustomerAdvisory.Message: Please be advised that the electricity service may be restored ahead of schedule or may be delayed beyond the stated time due to unforeseen causes. Motorists and pedestrians are asked to exercise caution during the times specified. VINLEC apologizes for any inconvenience caused to the general public. This Customer Advisory can also be accessed via our website at www.vinlec.com Emergency and WhatsApp: 456-1540.
